children.name: Investigate: Strategic question: Target exa...
children.content: Strategic question: Target exact-phrase and close-variant queries to capture any recent tweets explicitly claiming Trump sent troops to Venezuela. Use Latest to surface newest posts and viral claims that may have started circulating.

children.name: Investigate: Strategic question: A broader ...

children.name: Data: More National Guard deployment...
children.content:
More National Guard deployments into more cities, expanded military operations in Venezuela, Iran and North Korea (!?!?), and our troops being misused and politicized. 

Trump is on plan. And picking up steam. And nothing is stopping him. 

This is the most important story in America. Maybe in the world. 

I joined Nicolle Wallace on MSNBC for my weekly visit to break it all down. 

And I’ll have much more tonight on MSNBC’s 11th Hour Nightcap with Stephanie Ruhle at 11ET. We spend the full hour to get into all this, Kennedy Jr’s disastrous testimony, Trump’s economic promises, and my special back-to-school MVP. It’s a good one. 

Tune in or watch online to recap this crazy first week of September. (After baseball & football of course). Happy weekend!?!?🚨🇺🇸

children.name: Data: 🇺🇲⚡️🇻🇪 The US military is alre...
children.content: 🇺🇲⚡️🇻🇪 The US military is already practicing landing its troops on Venezuelan soil using various military equipment. President Nicolas Maduro has mobilized 8 million paramilitaries and reinforced his borders and coasts with military personnel. President Trump wants a war with Venezuela. A war with Venezuela will not end the way the US Pentagon envisions.

A war with Venezuela will not end the way the US Pentagon envisions.

children.name: Data: Is Trump preparing a US milita...
children.content:
Is Trump preparing a US military attack on Venezuela?

Trump deployed 3 warships and 4000 troops around Venezuela.

Trump put a mafia-style $50 million bounty on the head of President Maduro, and absurdly claimed he is the leader of a "terrorist cartel", to justify intervention. https://t.co/8O31H7U7r7

children.name: Data: US Military Strikes Drug-Carry...
children.content:
US Military Strikes Drug-Carrying Cartel Boat From Venezuela, Killing 11 Narcoterrorists

Trump sent a clear message. And, of course,  Democrats are bewailing the  death of these murderers. They take the wrong side on ever issue.  They’re really insane.

https://t.co/xyuurJYX6b https://t.co/C7uz1eChIC

children.name: Data: Unable to defeat Russia and Ir...
children.content:
Unable to defeat Russia and Iran, the US is now picking on a much smaller country: Venezuela.

Trump has sent three U.S. Navy missile destroyers—USS Gravely, USS Jason Dunham and USS Sampson—and around 4,000 military personnel to the edge of Venezuela’s territorial waters.

Maduro needs Russian protection.

properties.content:
Unable to defeat Russia and Iran, the US is now picking on a much smaller country: Venezuela.

Trump has sent three U.S. Navy missile destroyers—USS Gravely, USS Jason Dunham and USS Sampson—and around 4,000 military personnel to the edge of Venezuela’s territorial waters.

Maduro needs Russian protection.
